title: Out of the Dark
description: Once upon a time, I had it all. I was the golden boy of Ocean View before it was tragically taken away from me. It changed me into the man I am today. Most days I keep my head down and pretend that I don't hear the hushed voices that talk about me behind my back.Mute.Fractured.Broken.Until she dances into my life.Jillian Robinson is everything that I'm not. The town sweetheart; she is beautiful, sweet, and has a perfect soul that gives me hope again. She starts to make me realize that life was meant for living instead of just existing.With Jillian's help, I begin to pick up the pieces of my life.She brings out the good in me.Darkness once again becomes light. The light I thought had disappeared forever.*Out of the Dark is a standalone suitable for ages 18+. Contains sexual assault, cheating and suicidal thoughts, which may be disturbing for some readers.*
author: Sundae Leighton
